name: Little Ghost's Detective Adventure
description:
It's 12 a.m. and Little Ghost wakes up. He is dead. He now must venture into his friend Catto's eerie house to look for clues and question his friends, piecing together the events that happened before his death to figure out who killed him.

Art & Game: Riccardo Cantoon.

Dialogue Writer & Game Design Support: teeni.jpg.
